attributes.action: ensure that the Freedom of Information Act applies equally to members of the House of Commons as it does to any other organisation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The threat by David MacLean to exempt Member's of Parliament from FoI requests is a serious threat to the public's right to know about MP's expenses amongst other pieces of information. MP's must realise that they our spending OUR money, raised via taxes from the public and any threat to hide this from the public is to be resisted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
